name: Cosmosia
description:
This is the first game I made. I'm still learning the ropes of Game development.

Anyways, here's the plot:

Cosmosia is a cluster of floating islands in the middle of a black void. It is all ruled by the evil tyrant known as Solis the sun demon. The people have had enough of Solis' reign, and have chosen Callisto to go and stop Solis. However, Solis has created numerous guardians to prevent Callisto from getting into his fortress. Now you must play as Callisto as he embarks on the quest to stop Solis and free Cosmosia from his reign of terror!
